original_text: Thy silver and thy gold is mine; thy wives also and thy children, even the goodliest, are mine.
korean_text: 네 은금은 내 것이요 네 아내들과 네 자녀들의 아름다운 자도 내 것이니라 하매

sentences.original_text: Thy silver and thy gold is mine
sentences.korean_translation: 네 은과 네 금은 내 것이다

sentences.original_text: thy wives also and thy children
